name: Demon Burst (crabowitz)
description:
Art by @mdpotts

Music by @vincentizghra

Inspired by @heyphilsummers'  Entry for Famicase 2019

 - ~ CONTROLS ~

(Z)/(A BTN): Jump
(X)/(X BTN): Melee
(C)/(Y BTN): Sub Weapon
Jump In Air: Jump Ability
Up: Start climbing
Down+Jump on Platform: Drop down
(Enter)/(ESC)(Start): Pause

~ OPTIONS (Available at any time)~

(+)/(-): Zoom Window
(F): Fullscreen
(M): Toggle Music
